item.title: Infrastructure maintenance
item.content:encoded:
[Medium] - Routine Infrastructure Upgrade Summary: A routine upgrade to the infrastructure is scheduled, which may cause brief interruptions to app availability and delays in data availability. However, data collection will not be impacted.

THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Feb 25, 17:00 - 19:00 PST

Feb 22, 09:19 PST
Scheduled - We will be performing a routine upgrade to our infrastructure. There may be brief interruptions to the App availability and delays in data being available. Collection of data will not be impacted.

item.title: Initial properties sometimes not visible
item.content:encoded:
[Medium] - App Data Display Issue

We have identified an issue where initial properties are sometimes not visible in the app, leading to missing data in reports. Data collection is unaffected, and our engineers are working on a fix. Another update will be posted within 2 hours.

Feb 21, 16:00 PST
Identified - We have identified that initial properties are sometimes not visible in the app. You may notice missing data in your reports. Data collection is unaffected, and no data has been lost. Our engineers have diagnosed the issue and are working on a fix. We'll be posting another update within 2 hours.

item.title: Infrastructure Maintenance
item.content:encoded:
Feb 18, 21:00 PST
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Feb 18, 18:00 PST
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Feb 18, 09:03 PST
Scheduled - We will be undergoing scheduled maintenance during this time.

item.title: Infrastructure Maintenance
item.content:encoded:
Feb 18, 09:00 PST
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Feb 18, 06:00 PST
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Feb 15, 10:43 PST
Scheduled - We will be performing a routine upgrade to our infrastructure. There may be brief interruptions to the App availability and delays in data being available. Collection of data will not be impacted.

item.title: Data latency in the app
item.content:encoded:
Feb 13, 12:31 PST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved

Feb 13, 11:26 PST
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented. Some customers may still experience some latency. We continue to monitor.

Feb 13, 10:12 PST
Update - We continue to work on fixing this latency. Will update again in an hour.

Feb 13, 09:14 PST
Identified - The cause of the latency has been identified and we are working on fixing it. We will post another update within the hour.

Feb 13, 08:26 PST
Investigating - We are currently experiencing delays in data being available in the app. You may notice missing data in your reports. Data collection is unaffected, and no data has been lost. Our engineers are currently investigating the issue. We'll be posting another update in 60 mins.

item.title: BigQuery syncs are failing
item.content:encoded:
Feb 6, 00:39 PST
Resolved - The incident has been resolved; all environments have recovered from the delays.

Feb 5, 22:19 PST
Investigating - You should not expect to see any new events or users showing up in your BigQuery tables. Data collection is unaffected. No data has been lost.

item.title: Heap Connect Data Latency
item.content:encoded:
Feb 2, 22:02 PST
Resolved - The incident has been resolved; all environments have recovered from the delays.

Feb 2, 22:01 PST
Update - We are continuing to monitor for any further issues.

Feb 2, 22:00 PST
Update - We are continuing to monitor for any further issues.

Feb 2, 09:28 PST
Monitoring - Heap Connect is currently experiencing data latency for all warehouse destinations. Connect syncs are otherwise operational and will continue to sync any newly available data. Our engineering team is currently monitoring the situation and will post another update once the latency recovers.

item.title: Session list queries are currently not working.

Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jan 26, 09:55 PST
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we're continue to monitor.

Jan 26, 08:49 PST
Identified - We have diagnosed the issue and are working on a resolution. Data collection is not impacted, and no other query functionality is affected.

item.content:encoded:
Jan 10, 21:14 PST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jan 10, 19:36 PST
Update - We continue to investigate the delay.

Jan 10, 16:19 PST
Investigating - We are currently experiencing delays for Connect syncs. All environments appear to be affected.

Our engineers are currently investigating the issue. We'll be posting another update in 60 mins.

item.title: Heap Connect Sync Delays
item.content:encoded:
Jan 9, 21:53 PST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jan 9, 20:01 PST
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Jan 9, 17:11 PST
Investigating - We are currently experiencing delays for Connect Syncs. All environments appear to be affected.

Our engineering team is currently working to identify a root cause and implement a solution.

We will post an update in 30 minutes.

item.title: Tables are currently not available on dashboards
item.content:encoded:
Dec 4, 10:09 PST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved. Please reach out to support if you continue to have issues with tables loading in dashboards.

Dec 4, 09:41 PST
Identified - We have identified the issue and are working on a fix.

Dec 4, 09:34 PST
Investigating - We are investigating this issue.

item.title: App Unavailability
item.content:encoded:
Nov 15, 14:22 PST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Nov 15, 13:39 PST
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we're monitoring the results. Data latency is still elevated but recovering.

Nov 15, 12:33 PST
Update - We are continuing to work on a fix and data latency is still elevated. No data has been lost. We'll post another update in the next hour.

Nov 15, 11:10 PST
Update - We are continuing to work on a fix and data latency is still elevated. No data has been lost.

Nov 15, 09:32 PST
Identified - The issue has been identified and we're working on a fix. During this time you may observe elevated data latency into the Heap app. Collection is unaffected and no data has been lost.

Nov 15, 08:51 PST
Investigating - We're experiencing intermittent unavailability of Heap app queries. Data collection is unaffected. Our engineering team is investigating the issue and we'll post an update in the next 30 minutes.

item.title: Session Replay Scheduled Maintenance
item.content:encoded:
Nov 5, 03:00 PST
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Nov 4, 18:00 PDT
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Nov 3, 15:19 PDT
Scheduled - We will be undergoing scheduled maintenance in our session replay pipeline at this time. You will notice delays when accessing the latest sessions. No data will be lost. The previous replays are still accessible. Thanks for your patience.

item.title: Heap Connect Sync Delays
item.content:encoded:
Sep 29, 14:26 PDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Sep 29, 13:31 PDT
Update - Latency continues to improve. We expect syncs to be caught up in one hour.

Sep 29, 12:47 PDT
Monitoring - We have deployed a fix and are catching up delayed environments.

We will post an update in two hours, or resolve the incident if all environments have recovered.

Sep 29, 12:35 PDT
Identified - We have identified another issue and are working on a solution.

We will post an update in two hours.

Sep 29, 08:53 PDT
Monitoring - We have deployed a fix and are beginning to catchup delayed environments.

We will post an update in two hours, or resolve the incident if all environments have recovered.

Sep 29, 07:03 PDT
Identified - Our engineering team has identified the root cause of the delayed syncs and is working on a solution.

We will post an update in one hour.

item.title: Heap Help Center is unavailable
item.content:encoded:
Sep 14, 12:33 PDT
Resolved - This issue has been resolved.

Sep 14, 11:27 PDT
Identified - The Heap Help Center is currently unavailable due to an outage of our host. We do not currently have an ETA for a fix and will post an update as soon as we have more information. Please follow https://status.pantheon.io/incidents/kxzrlt08z6ky for additional updates.

item.title: Heap app is not loading
item.content:encoded:
Sep 11, 10:42 PDT
Resolved - This issue is no longer happening. No data collection was affected.

Sep 11, 10:31 PDT
Investigating - We are currently investigating the issue.

item.title: Temporary Degraded Query Performance
item.content:encoded:
Sep 6, 07:14 PDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Sep 5, 15:37 PDT
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Sep 5, 15:11 PDT
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Sep 5, 14:50 PDT
Investigating - We are currently experiencing degraded query performance in the app. You may notice data loading slowly in some reports. Data collection is unaffected, and no data has been lost. Our engineers are currently investigating the issue. We'll be posting another update in 60 mins.
